entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
